definition.name: NXdetector
definition.doc: Draft extension of NXdetector to include fields to describe photoelectron detectors.

field.name: amplifier_type
field.doc: Type of electron amplifier, MCP, channeltron, etc.

field.name: detector_type
field.doc: Description of the detector type, DLD, Phosphor+CCD, CMOS.

field.name: amplifier_bias
field.doc: The low voltage of the amplifier migh not be the ground.

field.name: sensor_size
field.doc: Size of each imaging sensor chip on the detector.

field.name: sensor_count
field.doc: Number of imaging sensor chips on the detector.

field.name: sensor_pixel_size
field.doc: Physical size of the pixels of the imaging chip on the detector.

field.name: sensor_pixels
field.doc: Number of raw active elements in each dimension. Important for swept scans.

group.name: DATA
group.doc: raw data output from the detector
